RoleTypeDefinition.name: organizational
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of roles that typically correspond to departments or business units within an organizational hierarchy.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: business
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of users that perform similar functions within the organization. Business Roles are associated with IT Roles or Entitlement Roles to provide specific levels of access to enterprise IT resources.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: it
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of IT entitlements which can be associated with Business Roles to provide users with specific access rights. IT Roles can be constrained to entitlements within a single application or expanded to include entitlements across applications.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: entitlement
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a single IT entitlement necessary to access data or perform a specific action within a target system.
